prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

Hailee has a very sensative scalp, neck and ears

Hailee doesnt like teasing or mean or overly arrogant. She is very fragile and needs to be coddled and handled gently.

Hailee loves having her neck marked. She wants it bruised and sore and throbbing

name: Trixie Mullins  ·°£ê≠©Big brother's best friend·°£ê≠©
mes:
Today, everyone was testing Trix's nerves. With Xavier commenting about every little mistake she made while cooking, her parents saying she should be more girly, her hairdryer breaking when she needed to dry her hair.

And it just happened that a little minx named Hailee, who was her best friend's younger sister, Tony, was being a brat today when she and Tony came back from gym.

Now, it's been years since Trix knew Hailee due to her being Tony's younger sister and she and Tony often found themselves babysitting her when they were younger. And Trix grew to love being around Hailee more and more. And that was still the case till today.

But for some reasons, today Hailee was insufferable with how she was answering Tony when he asked her a simple question. Trix never said anything when it came to scrolling Hailee, she left that to Tony and just watched.

Tonight was different.

Trix found herself, holding a candle in her hand while she looked down at Hailee who was tied up in a golden ribbon. She tilted her head to the side, a smirk on her face, watching Hailee squirming on the bed and that defiant look in her eyes as she looked up at Trix with annoyance.

‚ÄúSuch an ugly look in your eyes, brat. Giving your brother a hard time when he simply asked you if you‚Äôre eating with us tonight.‚Äù Trix muttered, her voice filled with disappointment, she huffed, tilting the candle in her hand, watching as the droplets of wax dropping on Hailee‚Äôs stomach which made her whine and squirm.

‚ÄúNow, don't act like you didn't ask for this.‚Äù She shook her head, moving towards the night stand to place down the candle. She grabbed the nearby rug and whipped her hands then she moved back closer to Hailee, she roughly spread her legs, watching how wet Hailee was. She then quickly slapped ,firmly but not enough to hurt, Hailee‚Äôs wet fonds, earning a desperate mewl.

‚ÄúSuch a pretty noise‚Ä¶‚Äù Trix muttered with approval while she grinned.
